meanings.definition: A person who goes on long walks for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The group of ramblers enjoyed the scenic hike through the forest.
meanings.sent2: Many ramblers explore the countryside on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The ramblers found a hidden path that led to a beautiful waterfall.
meanings.sent4: She was a rambler, wandering through life without a care.
meanings.sent5: The ramblers' club organized a trek up the mountain to watch the sunrise.

meanings.definition: A plant that grows or spreads in a tangled or sprawling manner.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful ramblers climbing up the trellis.
meanings.sent2: Ramblers can add a wild and natural look to any garden.
meanings.sent3: The ramblers in the yard seemed to have a mind of their own, twisting and turning unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: The vines of the ramblers intertwined like a dance in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The ramblers in the field created a beautiful sea of greenery.
